welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rafael Castillo, Argentina! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rafael Castillo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Hannoy
restaurants.description: Hannoy is a pizzeria located in Isidro Casanova.
restaurants.address: República de Portugal 1950 (e/ Virrey Cisneros y Fitz Roy), B1765JCD Isidro Casanova, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Confitería La Rueda
restaurants.description: Confitería La Rueda is a bakery located in San Justo.
restaurants.address: Av. Dr. Ignacio Arieta 2934, B1754APZ San Justo, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Sasafras
restaurants.description: Sasafras is a argentinian restaurant located in Villa Luzuriaga.
restaurants.address: República de Chile 10 (esq. Av. Don Bosco), B1753ACB Villa luzuriaga, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: La Moneda
restaurants.description: La Moneda is a argentinian restaurant located in Morón.
restaurants.address: Nuestra Señora del Buen Viaje 872 (esq. Belgrano), B1708ECP Morón, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Paula
restaurants.description: Paula is a café located in Castelar.
restaurants.address: Nicolás Avellaneda 1037 (esq. Montes de Oca), B1712JIC Castelar, Buenos Aires
